{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ASUS AX-112W.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wireless VoIP Gateway |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = https://www.asus.com/supportonly/AX-112W/HelpDesk_Manual/ |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = ASUS_AX-112W |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ASUS |model = AX-112 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = W |revision = (A4) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = analog phone gateway, VoIP phone adapter, |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = PDD-AR5BMB5 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = PMC-Sierra;MSP4200-NGC; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = <!-- undocumented --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 170 MHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV320; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4S281632I-UC75; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Realtek;RTL8201CP; |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8201CP; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:17:31 |oui = 00:C0:A8
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI |exp_minipci_num = 1
|pwr_volt_type = <!-- VDC,VAC or POE --> |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = VoIP, SIP, FXS, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- 07/15/2004 --> |estreldate = 03/2007 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Lite-On WN2302A |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR2414; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "AX112W REV:A4" and "0714" is silkscreened on the board. {{See also|ASUS|ASUS AX-112|ASUS iPBX-30}}
*[[ASUS AX-112W]] • ''VoIP Gateway'' • WAN, LAN, 2x FXS • [http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/component/content/article/36-reviews/61-asus-ax-112w.html Review] :CPU: [[PMC-Sierra]] MSP4200-NGC @170MHz :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX29LV320 4MB (NAND) <!-- [[ASUS WL-330gE]] --> :RAM: [[Samsung]] K4S281632I-UC75 32MB (2x 16MB) :LAN: 2x [[Realtek]] RTL8201CP (2x 10/100 Eth PHY) :WLAN: [[Lite-On WN2302A]]-F4 • [[Atheros]] AR2414 (AR5005G/GS) *[[ASUS AX-112]] • ''VoIP Gateway'' • WAN, LAN, 2x FXS ([http://files.wl500g.info/asus/ax112/img/ax112_victest.JPG WebUI]) :CPU: ''[http://www.myson.com.tw/en/product.php Myson Century]'' CS6222GY (32-bit SoC MCU for VoIP) :RISC/DSP CPU, 32ch DMA Controller, 2x 10/100 Base-T Eth :LAN: 2x [[Realtek]] RTL8201CP (10/100M Fast Ethernet PHY) <!-- :;[http://files.wl500g.info/asus/ax112/img/ax112_victest.JPG WebUI] *http://192.168.0.4/memory.htm *http://192.168.0.4/lanset.htm *http://192.168.0.4/victest.htm -->
